headline: Billionaire Charlie Munger Said 'The Hard Part' Of Getting Rich Is Saving The First $100,000. But He Found People Who Get There Fast Share 3 Traits
summary: You don't need to win the lottery, flip houses, or build the next TikTok. The late Charlie Munger—Warren Buffett's longtime business partner and razor-sharp co-pilot at Berkshire Hathaway—said real wealth starts with one brutal milestone: the first ...
